tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserInteractions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  ad_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(255),
  interaction_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE AdTargeting (
  ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ad_name VARCHAR(255),
  ad_type VARCHAR(255),
  target_audience VARCHAR(255),
  created_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ads (
    ad_id INT,
    ad_name VARCHAR(50),
    ad_content TEXT,
    ad_category VARCHAR(50),
    ad_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE ads (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_title VARCHAR(100),
    ad_content TEXT,
    target_audience VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ad_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    ad_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ad_targeting (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    target_audience VARCHAR(50),
    targeting_parameters TEXT,
    user_preferences TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(255),
    user_age INT,
    user_gender VARCHAR(10),
    user_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE UserInteractions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    ad_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    interaction_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (ad_id) REFERENCES Advertisements(ad_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AdClicks (
    click_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    click_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (ad_id) REFERENCES Advertisements(ad_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AdImpressions (
    impression_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    impression_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (ad_id) REFERENCES Advertisements(ad_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);
